ygData.subject: Re: Armours Trade
ygData.msgSnippet: usually ppl will shout to sell banded at EC. the tunic is 35pp though, but I got mine for 20pp. heheh ... From: Entreri  To:
ygData.messageBody:
usually ppl will shout to sell banded at EC. the tunic is 35pp though, but I
got mine for 20pp. heheh
